name: layers-ui
description: A lightweight utility-first CSS library with theming support

scripts.clean-all: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:docs
scripts.build-all: npm run build:scss && npm run build:scss:min && npm run build:css && npm run build:css:min
scripts.copy:docs: mkdir -p docs/layers && cp dist/layers.css docs/layers/layers.css && mkdir -p docs/fonts && cp dist/fonts/* docs/fonts/
scripts.copy-all: npm run copy:dist && npm run copy:docs
scripts.build: npm run clean-all && npm run build-all && npm run copy-all

author: Athreya M R
